body_html: Please look again at my earlier post and the stackoverlfow post you cite. According to your logging messages, you're trying to allocate 7.92GB from a GPU that has only 7.30GB free. You need to reduce the allocation fraction using tf.GPUOptions.
body_text: Please look again at my earlier post and the stackoverlfow post you cite.  According to your logging messages, you're trying to allocate 7.92GB from a GPU that has only 7.30GB free.  You need to reduce the allocation fraction using tf.GPUOptions.
body: Please look again at my earlier post and the stackoverlfow post you cite.  According to your logging messages, you're trying to allocate 7.92GB from a GPU that has only 7.30GB free.  You need to reduce the allocation fraction using tf.GPUOptions.
